Biography

I am a second year PhD in Computer Science student at Stony Brook University, where I am fortunate to be advised by Prof. Omar Chowdhury. In May 2023, I successfully completed my graduate studies in Computer Science at the University of New Brunswick, Canada. During my time pursuing my graduate studies, I served as a Graduate Research Assistant at the Canadian Institute of Cybersecurity. My research interests spanned the Internet of Things (IoT), Anomaly Detection, and Security under the supevision of Professor Ali Ghorbani. In my doctoral studies, guided by my current advisor where I am focusing on research in Security, Privacy, Formal Methods, and Automated Reasoning.
